templates.title: Teamviewer APP
templates.description: A container to access Weidm√ºller Devies from the Teamviewer IoT portal
templates.note: Deploys the Teamviewer IoT Agent together with a connector to the u-control global variables.

env.name: HOSTNAME
env.label: Device name
env.description: Name of the IOT Device as it is registred in the Teamviewer IoT

env.name: ASSIGNMENT_GROUP_NAME
env.label: Teamviewer IoT Assignment Group Name
env.description: Name of the Assignment Group where the device is registered

env.name: SENSOR_NAME
env.label: Teamviewer Sensor name
env.description: Name of the sensor under which the metrics are published. If you leave it empty a default name is generated.

env.name: VAR_PREFIX
env.label: Prefix to filter global variable list
env.description: Only global variables starting with the prefix are publised to the Teamviewer IoT portal. If you leave it empty all variables published.
